reuters.title: AMER SIGNS 50 MLN DOLLAR MULTICURRENCY LOAN
reuters.body: Finland's business group Amer-Yhtyma Oy <YHTY.HE> said it has signed a 50 mln dlr, six-year syndicated multicurrency loan with a group of 15 international and four Finnish banks led by Citicorp Investment Bank Ltd. Amer said in a statement the loan would be used mainly to convert its overseas currency loans and expand business, but gave no further details. REUTER 
